meanings.sent1: The smooth, awnless grass felt nice under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The farmer planted an awnless variety of wheat in the field.
meanings.sent3: The cat preferred to nap on the awnless blanket, avoiding any discomfort.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, like an awnless field, flowed freely in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The awnless landscape stretched out before us, peaceful and serene.

meanings.sent1: The awnless flower petals were soft to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The awnless cat enjoyed being petted without any irritation.
meanings.sent3: The awnless teddy bear looked cute and cuddly on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as smooth and awnless as a calm lake.
meanings.sent5: The awnless fabric draped elegantly, without any rough edges.
